Name: Block'Em!
About the game: Block'Em! is an action-filled block-building party game for 2 to 4 players ! The controls are simple but the road to victory is complex. Be the first to reach the goal or be the last Blocky standing! Cute, addictive and fast paced party game to be enjoyed by 2-4 players. Outsmarting your opponent with cunning moves is easier said than done! An exciting mix of platform and puzzle! Find your way through the vibrant, chaotic arena. Watch out for the fireballs! Block’Em brings out your competitive side. A sure way to make friendships stronger… or not! Beat your opponents in a race to the finish or be the last Block to survive. Eat. Sleep. Block’Em. Repeat.
